name: Undead Invasion (itch)
description:
I just finished my 3rd game in time for Halloween called "Undead Invasion".  I used some old Hero's of Might&Magic sprite sheets and coded my first sprite sheet animations with them.  This game was lots of hard work to create and I learned so much!  There is a volume slider and difficulty slider in the options menu.  The difficulty button does nothing right now as it was more of a learning experience for me to prepare my scripts for bigger games.  I also added a "Pause", "Play" and "Restart" button at the bottom of the play screens.  It helps to pause the game in the beginning, place your defenders then press play to resume again.  Or if you are the ultimate undead destroyer, just ignore those buttons and kick some undead butt!

Have fun and Happy Halloween!
